first_translate: I felt so lonely...
review: I was lonely.
idiom:
벌레만도 못한 목숨 : A worthless life
기어코 일은 터졌다 : Trouble finally broke out
인간 방패라도 되라고 : Be a human shield
살기 위해 버텼다 : Endured to survive
역부족이었다 : It was beyond my ability
어딘가에 빛이 있을 거라고 : There must be light somewhere
누군가의 빛이 되고 싶어 : I want to be someone's light
지긋지긋했던 내 인생 : My miserable life

first_translate: hoping that nobody will go through what I went through makes me weak.
review: Wishing that no one lives like I did is weak of me.
idiom:
벌레만도 못한 목숨 : A worthless life
기어코 일은 터졌다 : Trouble finally broke out
인간 방패라도 되라고 : Be a human shield
살기 위해 버텼다 : Endured to survive
역부족이었다 : It was beyond my ability
어딘가에 빛이 있을 거라고 : There must be light somewhere
누군가의 빛이 되고 싶어 : I want to be someone's light
지긋지긋했던 내 인생 : My miserable life

hangle: 그런 생각이나 하니 결국 이렇게 죽는 거야.
first_translate: this kind of thinking is why I ended up here today.
review: Thinking like this is why I'm dying like this.
